availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Lafayette Wilson (Vanderburgh Co. IN barkeeper, and Hopkins County, KY, merchant )

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, barkeeper and merchant. Kentucky native. Married Lelia Tuberville in Christian County, Kentucky, on August 24, 1864. Barkeeper in Vanderburgh County, Indiana, in 1850. Merchant in Madisonville, Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Indiana, Vanderburgh County, Pigeon Ward 7, p. 368B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, Madisonville, p. 833.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, X County Marriages, Film #000465564, p. 106.
